EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering: Mechanical Components Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}}
Thank you for registering for the Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Conference for Mechanical Components (details below).
{{my.Add to Calendar:default=edit me}}
Mechanical Components Webinar – Americas/EMEAI March 9, 2021 7:00-9:00am MST
In order to facilitate a more interactive discussion, this webinar will be held through a Microsoft Teams meeting. Please look forward to an invitation to the meeting from me soon.
Thank you, Jeff Kucharski
jeff.a.kucharski@honeywell.com
